altername_name: Mole Hunter (duplicate alt name without region tag, pleae delete)
name: Topy
overview: Kill the moles with your hammer as many as possible. When it is making a noise to come out from the cave, it is easier for you to hammer. Occasionally, a snake comes out from a cave. Kill it before it attacks you. Occasionally, you lose your hammer. Get it back as soon as possible when it appears. Other versions with a different title: Mole Control [Hi-Score (Action Hi-Tech)] Gefährliche Mäusejagd [Quelle] Mole Hunter [Suntek] Mole Hunter [Taiwan - Cooper Black] Hole Hunter [Taiwan - TP-6xx Series]
